title: Aural set, Symph 93 - melody scale degrees

content.description: You will hear four sections from the beginning of a symphonic movement. Sections 1 and 2 will be played twice, then sections 3 and 4 will be played once. Finally, the entire excerpt will be played once. Before listening to each section, please read the questions.
content.question: The first four notes of the melody are scale degrees

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Use symbols and terms to describe features of pitch in performed music, including pitch patterns and relationships, melodic features, chords, harmonic progressions, and cadences.
